body: //div[contains(@class, 'everywhere-article-content')]
date: //meta[@id="metaPublishDate"]/@content
author: //meta[@id="metaAuthor"]/@content

strip_id_or_class: pullQuotes
strip: //noscript

find_string: data-original-src=
replace_string: src=

prune: no

test_url: https://www.aarp.org/money/scams-fraud/info-2021/international-tech-support-scam-exposed.html
